SEARCH
Package com.hexaware.payxpert.dao

Interface IPayrollDao

All Known Implementing Classes:
PayrollDao
public interface IPayrollDao
The IPayrollDao interface defines methods for Payroll-related database operations such as creating payrolls, retrieving payrolls by ID, employee ID, and for a specific period. Implementing classes must provide concrete implementations for these methods.
Since:
2024-02-07
Version:
1.0
Author:
Praveen Kumar Kuruba

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    createPayroll(Payroll payroll)
    Creates a new payroll record in the database.
    Payroll
    getPayrollById(int payrollId)
    Retrieves a payroll record by its ID from the database.
    List<Payroll>
    getPayrollsForEmployee(int employeeId)
    Retrieves all payrolls associated with a specific employee from the database.
    List<Payroll>
    getPayrollsForPeriod(String startPeriod, String endPeriod)
    Retrieves all payrolls for a specific period from the database.

  • Method Details

    • createPayroll

      void createPayroll(Payroll payroll) throws DatabaseConnectionException
      Creates a new payroll record in the database.
      Parameters:
      payroll - The Payroll object containing payroll details to be stored.
      Throws:
      DatabaseConnectionException - If there is an issue connecting to the database.

    • getPayrollById

      Payroll getPayrollById(int payrollId) throws DatabaseConnectionException
      Retrieves a payroll record by its ID from the database.
      Parameters:
      payrollId - The ID of the payroll to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The Payroll object if found, otherwise null.
      Throws:
      DatabaseConnectionException - If there is an issue connecting to the database.

    • getPayrollsForEmployee

      List<Payroll> getPayrollsForEmployee(int employeeId)
      Retrieves all payrolls associated with a specific employee from the database.
      Parameters:
      employeeId - The ID of the employee for whom payrolls should be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of Payroll objects.

    • getPayrollsForPeriod

      List<Payroll> getPayrollsForPeriod(String startPeriod, String endPeriod) throws DatabaseConnectionException
      Retrieves all payrolls for a specific period from the database.
      Parameters:
      startPeriod - The start date of the period for which payrolls should be retrieved.
      endPeriod - The end date of the period for which payrolls should be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of Payroll objects.
      Throws:
      DatabaseConnectionException - If there is an issue connecting to the database.
